actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution providing for the printing as a House document of a report of the Select Committee on Intelligence.

summary.text: Provides that the report of the Select Committee on Intelligence filed on January 29, 1976, and entitled "Report of the Investigations of the United States Intelligence Agencies and Activities" shall be printed and distributed as a House document.

titles.title: Resolution providing for the printing as a House document of a report of the Select Committee on Intelligence.
